betterquesting:10.desc:8:
This is Tier 2 of Ore Processing which produces §atriple the amount inputted§r.

This is one of the §echeap and easy early-game ore-processing steps§r. To do this, you'll have to §eput the Ore in a §6Purification Chamber§r that is supplied with §6Oxygen§r. This will give you 3 clumps which then would go into the §6Crusher§r to be turned into dust. The §edust can now be smelted to turn into their ingot form§r.

§n§lProsedure:§r
1. Ore + Oxygen  >  §6Purification Chamber§r  >  Clump
2. Clump  >  §6Crusher§r  >  Dust
3. Dust  >  §6Energized Smelter§r  >  Ingot

§7TIP: I recommend getting the Gas Upgrade for the Purification Chamber so you can save on spending too much oxygen. §r
